tuv.seg: Case study: Carer's leave and annual leave
Cás- Staidéar ar shaoire cúramóra agus saoire bhliantúil
Tom took carer's leave from work to look after his father who was seriously ill
Thóg Tom saoire cúramóra ón obair chun aire a thabhairt dá athair a bhí go dona breoite
He took 78 weeks which was most of his entitlement
Thóg sé formhór a theidlíocht de 78 seachtaine
On his return to work, he was discussing annual leave with his employer
Ar fhilleadh chun na hoibre dó, bhí sé ag plé saoire bliantúil lena fhostóir
His employer said that, as he understood it, employees cannot take annual leave in the same calendar year the carer's leave ends. Is this correct or not?
Dúirt a fhostóir, mar a thuig sé féin, nach féidir le fostaithe saoire bhliantúil a thógáil sa bhliain fhéilire céanna ina gcríochnaíonn saoire cúramóra
Tom's employer is incorrect
Tá fostóir Tom mícheart
Provided Tom has accumulated sufficient hours of work, he is entitled to take annual leave, even if this occurs in the same calendar year as his carer's leave ends

Chomh fada agus go bhfuil dóthain uaireanta oibre carnaithe ag Tom, tá sé i dteideal saoire bliantúil a thógáil, fiú amháin má tharlaíonn sé seo sa bhliain fhéilire céanna ina gcríochnaíonn a shaoire cúramóra
Only the first 13 weeks however of the period spent on carer's leave count towards establishing entitlement to annual leave
An chéad 13 seachtaine amháin cibé ar bith a áirítear i dtreo theidlíocht do shaoire bhliantúil a bhunú
In the same way, Tom only has rights in respect of public holidays falling in the first 13 weeks of his carer's leave
Ar an mbealach céanna, níl cearta ag Tom ach amháin maidir le saoire phoiblí a thiteann sa chéad 13 seachtaine dá shaoire cúramóra
The maximum period of carer's leave is 104 weeks
Is an tuastréimhse do shaoire cúramóra 104 seachtaine
If Tom's father becomes ill again, Tom can apply for the balance of his carer's leave
Má éiríonn athair Tom breoite arís, is féidir le Tom iarratas a dhéanamh ar an bhfuílleach dá shaoire cúramóra
He is entitled to a maximum of 26 weeks provided there is a gap of at least 6 weeks between the two periods of carer's leave
Tá sé i dteideal d'uasmhéid de 26 seachtaine chomh fada agus go bhfuil bearna atá ar laghad 6 seachtaine idir an dá thréimhse shaoire cúramóra
